actionCalls.name: Send_Approved_Email_to_Distributor_Submittor
actionCalls.label: Send Approved Email to Distributor Submittor

value.stringValue:
Dear {!Get_User_Approved.Name},

TSCA approval has been granted.

Request Details

Order Number:{!Order.OrderNumber}
Ship To Name:{!Order.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Requestor:{!Order.Owner:User.FirstName} {!Order.Owner:User.LastName}

View Order in Salesforce


Best regards,
Your CRM Support Team

(The mySalesforce system automatically generated this message.)

actionCalls.name: Send_Approved_Email_to_Running_User
actionCalls.label: Send Approved Email to Running User

value.stringValue:
Dear {!Get_Running_User_Approved.Name},

TSCA approval has been granted.

Request Details

Order Number:{!Order.OrderNumber}
Ship To Name:{!Order.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Requestor:{!Order.Owner:User.FirstName} {!Order.Owner:User.LastName}

View Order in Salesforce


Best regards,
Your CRM Support Team

(The mySalesforce system automatically generated this message.)

actionCalls.name: Send_In_Approval_Email_to_Distributor_Submittor
actionCalls.label: Send In Approval Email to Distributor Submittor

value.stringValue:
Dear {!Get_User_In_Approval.Name},

Order has been submitted for TSCA Approval.

Request Details

Order Number:{!Order.OrderNumber}
Ship To Name:{!Order.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Requestor:{!Order.Owner:User.FirstName} {!Order.Owner:User.LastName}

View Order in Salesforce


Best regards,
Your CRM Support Team

(The mySalesforce system automatically generated this message.)

textTemplates.description: Post to Chatter whenever the Approves
textTemplates.name: orderApprovalMessage
orderInApprovalMessage
textTemplates.text: The Sample Order has been submitted for TSA approval.

textTemplates.description: Post to Chatter whenever the TSA Rejects
textTemplates.name: orderRejectMessage
textTemplates.text:
Dear @[{!Order.OwnerId}], Kindly be informed that the status of Sample Order {!Order.OrderNumber} has been changed to the status {!Order.Status}.
Best regards, Your CRM Support Team

textTemplates.description: Post to Chatter whenever the TSA Rejects
textTemplates.name: orderRejectMessageDM
textTemplates.text:
Dear @[{!Get_User_Rejected.Id}], Kindly be informed that the status of Sample Order {!Order.OrderNumber} has been changed to the status {!Order.Status}.
Best regards, Your CRM Support Team
